Unfortunately, some fixes aren't as easy as others, which means they'll require a bit more time, both in development, and in testing. Every bug fix needs to be tested, and in some cases, the first fix may not stick or resolve an issue completely (speaking in terms of skins here, but it applies to all disciplines).
